name: cert-is
description: Provides a collection of assertion tools for checking strict equality, type, and range of a set of values.

scripts.update: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && ncu -u && npm i -d && node scripts/superForceResolutions.js
scripts.prepack: npm run-script update && npm run-script write-public-api-docs && npm test
scripts.serve-private-docs: documentation serve --watch index.js -a public private protected undefined
scripts.write-public-api-docs: documentation readme index.js -s API -a public --github && node scripts/fixREADME.js

author: Justin Collier
